caption.p: Total flavonoids and total phenolic contents of the hydro-ethanolic extract of Nymphaea lotus (NLE) leaves. Panel 1.1: Total flavonoid content of NLE (2.5 mg/ml – 10 mg/ml) expressed as quercetin equivalent (QE). Panel 1.2: Total phenolic content of various concentrations of NLE (2.5 mg/ml- 10 mg/ml) expressed as gallic acid equivalent (GAE). Each point represents the mean value ± standard error on the mean (SEM), ( n = 3)
